description: ECMAScript 6 (Harmony) compatibility shims for legacy JavaScript engines
name: es6-shim

scripts.eslint: npm run --silent eslint:shim && npm run --silent eslint:sham
scripts.jscs: npm run --silent jscs:shim && npm run --silent jscs:sham
scripts.jshint: npm run --silent jshint:shim && npm run --silent jshint:sham
scripts.lint: npm run --silent lint:shim && npm run --silent lint:sham
scripts.lint:sham: npm run --silent jshint:sham && npm run --silent jscs:sham && npm run --silent eslint:sham
scripts.lint:shim: npm run --silent jshint:shim && npm run --silent jscs:shim && npm run --silent eslint:shim
scripts.minify: npm run --silent minify:shim && npm run --silent minify:sham
scripts.tests-only: npm run --silent test:shim && npm run --silent test:sham
